response.overview: Лейбл:Sire – R2 76449, Warner Bros. Records – R2 76449, Rhino Records (2) – R2 76449 Формат:Hybrid, DualDisc, Multichannel, Album, Reissue, Remastered, Stereo Страна:US Дата релиза:2006 Жанр:Rock Стиль:New Wave, Art Rock Recorded at Sundragon Studios, N.Y.C. Mixed at Media Sound, N.Y.C. DVD side features the original album in 5.1 Surround Sound and Dolby Stereo, a photo gallery and two bonus live videos.
response.title: Talking Heads – Talking Heads: 1977
